CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 24, 1957, pg. B7 reads: "More Winners in most successful ABA tournament in recent years. Standing: George Wilson, Pittsburgh au revoir pair, with Mrs. Lucile Hayes; Miss Claudia Gist, Pittsburgh, senior masters mixed pair; Mrs. Betty Alexander, Pittsburgh, Parkway pair; first, Mrs. Rose Milton, Pittsburgh; Mrs. Martha Morris, Pittsburgh ,individual.  Front row: Joseph Robinson, Pittsburgh, non-masters men's pair, first, with Joseph E. Brock, Pittsburgh.  Reuben Haley, Pittsburgh, winer in the Parkway pairs and the au revoir pairs. - Teenie Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of trophy winners, from left, front row: Joseph Robinson, Joseph E. Brock, and Reuben Haley; standing: George Wilson, Lucille Hayes, Claudia Gist, Betty Alexander, Rose Milton, and Martha Morris, posed in Fort Pitt Hotel for 24th annual American Bridge Association tournament
